traits.name: Bodyguard
traits.desc: If your are adjacent to a creature that is the target of an attack that doesn't include you, you can redirect the attack onto yourself.

traits.name: Mace
traits.desc: Melee: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target Hit: 5 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Shield Bash
traits.desc: Save: DC 11 vs Str, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: the creature is pushed 5 ft. and knocked prone.

traits.name: Zealous Assault
traits.desc: Melee: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target Hit: 5 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
